questions.content:
若函数 $f(x) = \left\{ \begin{array}{ll} (1 + x^2)^{\frac{1}{x^2}}, & x \neq 0, \\ a, & x = 0 \end{array} \right.$，在 $x = 0$ 处连续，则 $a =$ （）
A. 0
B. 1
C.e
D. e²
questions.answer:
C
【精析】因为 $f(x)$ 在 $x = 0$ 处连续，所以 $\lim_{x\to 0}f(x) = f(0)$，又 $\lim_{x\to 0}f(x) = \lim_{x\to 0}(1 + x^2)^{\frac{1}{x^2}} = e, f(0) = a$，故 $a = e$

questions.content:
曲线 $y = x\mathrm{e}^{-x}$ 在点 $(1,\mathrm{e}^{-1})$ 处的切线斜率是（）
A. $-\mathrm{e}^{-1}$
B. 0
C. ${\mathrm{e}}^{-1}$
D. $2 \mathrm{e}^{- 1}$
questions.answer:
B
【精析】$y^\prime = \mathrm{e}^{-x} - x\mathrm{e}^{-x} = (1 - x)\mathrm{e}^{-x}$，则曲线在点 $(1,\mathrm{e}^{-1})$ 处的切线斜率为 $y^\prime (1) = 0$

questions.content:
设 $2x$ 是 $f(x)$ 的一个原函数，则 $\int_0^{\frac{\pi}{2}}[f(x) - \sin x]\mathrm{d}x =$ （）
A. $\pi - 1$
B. $\pi + 1$
C. $\frac{\pi^2}{4} - 1$
D. $\frac{\pi^2}{4} + 1$
questions.answer:
A
【精析】由题意知 $2x$ 是 $f(x)$ 的一个原函数，因此 $f(x) = (2x)' = 2$。于是所求积分为 $\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} [f(x) - \sin x] \, dx = \int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} (2 - \sin x) \, dx$。计算得 $\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} 2 \, dx = 2x \big|_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} = \pi$，而 $\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \sin x \, dx = -\cos x \big|_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} = -\left(0 - 1\right) = 1$。因此原积分 $= \pi - 1$，故正确答案为 A。

questions.content:
设级数 $\sum_{n = 1}^{\infty}u_n$ 收敛，则下列级数发散的是（）
A. $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} 4u_n$
B. $\sum_{n = 1}^{\infty}u_{n + 4}$
C. $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}\left(u_{n}-u_{n+1}\right)$
D. $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}(u_n - 1)$
questions.answer:
D
【精析】因为 $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} u_n$ 收敛，由常数项级数的基本性质可知 A、B、C 项级数均收敛，又由级数收敛的必要条件知 $\lim_{n\to \infty}u_n = 0$，而 $\lim_{n\to \infty}(u_n - 1) = -1\neq 0$ 故 $\sum_{n = 1}^{\infty}(u_n - 1)$ 发散.

questions.content: 曲线 $y = \frac{\sin x}{x}$ 的水平渐近线方程为 $y =$
questions.answer:
0
【精析】因为无穷小与有界函数之积仍为无穷小，且 $|\sin x| \leqslant 1$，则 $\lim_{x \to \infty} \frac{\sin x}{x} = \lim_{x \to \infty} \frac{1}{x}\sin x = 0$，故所求水平渐近线为 $y = 0$.

questions.content: 已知常数 $k > 0$，若 $\int_{k}^{+\infty} \frac{1}{x^2} \mathrm{d}x = 1$，则 $k =$ ________.
questions.answer:
1
【精析】$\int_{k}^{+\infty}\frac{1}{x^2}\mathrm{d}x = -\frac{1}{x}\Big|_{k}^{+\infty} = -\lim_{x\to +\infty}\frac{1}{x} -\left(-\frac{1}{k}\right) = \frac{1}{k} = 1$，则 $k = 1$

questions.content: 设二元函数 $z = x^{x} + (x - y)^{2}$ （$x > 0$），则 $\frac{\partial^2 z}{\partial y \partial x} =$ ________.
questions.answer:
-2
【精析】$\frac{\partial z}{\partial y} = 2(x - y) \cdot (x - y)' = -2(x - y)$，则 $\frac{\partial^2 z}{\partial y \partial x} = [-2(x - y)]'_x = -2.$

questions.content: 交换二次积分 $\int_{0}^{1} \mathrm{d}x \int_{\sqrt{x}}^{1} f(x, y) \mathrm{d}y$ 的积分次序，则 $\int_{0}^{1} \mathrm{d}x \int_{\sqrt{x}}^{1} f(x, y) \mathrm{d}y =$
questions.answer:
$\int_0^1\mathrm{d}y\int_0^{y^2}f(x,y)\mathrm{d}x$
【精析】由题意可得积分区域为：$0\leqslant x\leqslant 1,\sqrt{x}\leqslant y\leqslant 1$，积分区域还可表示为：$0\leqslant x\leqslant y^{2},0\leqslant y\leqslant 1$，故 $\int_0^1\mathrm{d}x\int_{\sqrt{x}}^1 f(x,y)\mathrm{d}y = \int_0^1\mathrm{d}y\int_0^{y^2}f(x,y)\mathrm{d}x.$

questions.content: 微分方程 $y'' - 8y' + 7y = 0$ 的通解为 $y =$
questions.answer:
$C_1\mathrm{e}^x + C_2\mathrm{e}^{7x}$
【精析】该微分方程的特征方程为 $r^2 - 8r + 7 = 0$，解得特征根 $r_1 = 1, r_2 = 7$，故所求通解为 $y = C_1 \mathrm{e}^x + C_2 \mathrm{e}^{7x}$

questions.content: 求函数 $y = \sqrt{x + \cos x}$ 在 $x = 0$ 处的微分 $\mathrm{d}y \Big|_{x = 0}$.
questions.answer:
【精析】$y^\prime = \frac{1}{2\sqrt{x + \cos x}}\cdot (x + \cos x)^\prime = \frac{1 - \sin x}{2\sqrt{x + \cos x}},$
则 $y^\prime \Big|_{x = 0} = \frac{1}{2}$ 故 $\mathrm{dy}\Big|_{x = 0} = \frac{1}{2}\mathrm{dx}$

questions.content: 已知函数 $f(x)$ 的导数 $f^{\prime}(x) = \frac{\ln x}{x}$，求曲线 $y = f(x)$ 在 $(0, +\infty)$ 内的凹凸区间.
questions.answer:
【精析】$f^{\prime}(x) = \frac{\ln x}{x}, f^{\prime \prime}(x) = \frac{\frac{1}{x} \cdot x - \ln x}{x^{2}} = \frac{1 - \ln x}{x^{2}},$
令 $f^{\prime \prime}(x) = 0$，解得 $x = \mathrm{e}$，当 $0 < x < \mathrm{e}$ 时，$f^{\prime \prime}(x) > 0$；当 $x > \mathrm{e}$ 时，$f^{\prime \prime}(x) < 0$ 故 $f(x)$ 的凹区间为 $(0, \mathrm{e}]$，凸区间为 $[\mathrm{e}, +\infty)$.

questions.content: 求不定积分 $\int (2x - 1)\mathrm{e}^x\mathrm{d}x$
questions.answer:
【精析】$\int (2x - 1)\mathrm{e}^x\mathrm{d}x = \int (2x - 1)\mathrm{d}\mathrm{e}^x = \mathrm{e}^x (2x - 1) - \int 2\mathrm{e}^x\mathrm{d}x$
$$
\begin{array}{l} = \mathrm {e} ^ {x} (2 x - 1) - 2 \mathrm {e} ^ {x} + C \\ = (2 x - 3) \mathrm {e} ^ {x} + C. \\ \end{array}
$$

questions.content: 设函数 $f(x) = \begin{cases} \frac{2x^3}{1 + x^2}, & x \leqslant 1, \\ 1, & x > 1, \end{cases}$ 计算定积分 $\int_{-1}^{4} f(x) \, \mathrm{d}x$.
questions.answer:
【精析】$\int_{-1}^{4}f(x)\mathrm{d}x = \int_{-1}^{1}f(x)\mathrm{d}x + \int_{1}^{4}f(x)\mathrm{d}x = \int_{-1}^{1}\frac{2x^3}{1 + x^2}\mathrm{d}x + \int_{1}^{4}\mathrm{d}x,$
因为 $\frac{2x^3}{1 + x^2}$ 是 $[-1, 1]$ 上的奇函数，则 $\int_{-1}^{1} \frac{2x^3}{1 + x^2} \mathrm{d}x = 0$
故 $\int_{-1}^{4} f(x) \, \mathrm{d}x = \int_{-1}^{1} \frac{2x^3}{1 + x^2} \, \mathrm{d}x + \int_{1}^{4} \, \mathrm{d}x = 0 + x\Big|_{1}^{4} = 3.$

questions.content: 设 $z = \ln 3 - x^{2} \mathrm{e}^{y^{2}z}$，求 $\frac{\partial z}{\partial x}$ 及 $\frac{\partial z}{\partial y}$.
计算二重积分 $\iint_{D} (x^2 + y^2)^2 \, \mathrm{d}\sigma$，其中 $D$ 是由圆周 $x^2 + y^2 = 1$ 所围成的区域。
questions.answer:
【精析】令 $x = r\cos \theta, y = r\sin \theta$，积分区域在极坐标系下可表示为：$0 \leqslant \theta \leqslant 2\pi, 0 \leqslant r \leqslant 1$，故
$$
\begin{array}{l} \iint_ {D} (x ^ {2} + y ^ {2}) ^ {2} d \sigma = \int_ {0} ^ {2 \pi} d \theta \int_ {0} ^ {1} r ^ {4} \cdot r d r = \int_ {0} ^ {2 \pi} d \theta \int_ {0} ^ {1} r ^ {5} d r \\ = \theta \left| _ {0} ^ {2 \pi} \cdot \frac {1}{6} r ^ {6} \right| _ {0} ^ {1} = 2 \pi \times \frac {1}{6} = \frac {\pi}{3}. \\ \end{array}
$$

questions.content: 已知 $u_{n}$ 满足 $\left(\frac{1}{2}\right)^n \leqslant u_n \leqslant \frac{n^2}{2^n} (n = 1, 2, \dots)$, 判定级数 $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} u_n$ 的收敛性.
questions.answer:
【精析】由 $u_{n} \geqslant \left(\frac{1}{2}\right)^{n}$ 可知 $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} u_{n}$ 为正项级数，记 $v_{n} = \frac{n^{2}}{2^{n}}$
又 $\lim_{n\to \infty}\frac{v_{n + 1}}{v_n} = \lim_{n\to \infty}\frac{(n + 1)^2\cdot 2^n}{2^{n + 1}\cdot n^2} = \lim_{n\to \infty}\frac{(n + 1)^2}{2n^2} = \frac{1}{2} < 1,$，由比值审敛法可知 $\sum_{n = 1}^{\infty}\frac{n^2}{2^n}$ 收敛，因为 $u_{n}\leqslant \frac{n^{2}}{2^{n}}$，则由正项级数的比较审敛法可知 $\sum_{n = 1}^{\infty}u_{n}$ 收敛.

questions.content:
证明：当 $x > 0$ 时，
(1) $\arctan x = \frac{\pi}{2} -\arctan \frac{1}{x};$
(2) $\arctan x < \ln (x + \sqrt{1 + x^2})$.
questions.answer:
【证明】（1）设 $f(x) = \arctan x + \arctan \frac{1}{x} -\frac{\pi}{2},$
$$
f ^ {\prime} (x) = \frac {1}{1 + x ^ {2}} + \frac {1}{1 + \frac {1}{x ^ {2}}} \cdot \left(- \frac {1}{x ^ {2}}\right) - 0 = \frac {1}{1 + x ^ {2}} - \frac {1}{1 + x ^ {2}} = 0,
$$
则 $f(x)$ 在 $(0, +\infty)$ 内是一个常数，令 $x = 1$，得 $f(1) = \frac{\pi}{4} + \frac{\pi}{4} - \frac{\pi}{2} = 0$，即 $f(x) = 0$ 故当 $x > 0$ 时，$\arctan x = \frac{\pi}{2} - \arctan \frac{1}{x}$
(2) 设 $g(x) = \ln (x + \sqrt{1 + x^2}) - \arctan x, x \geqslant 0$，则
$$
\begin{array}{l} g ^ {\prime} (x) = \frac {1}{x + \sqrt {1 + x ^ {2}}} \cdot (x + \sqrt {1 + x ^ {2}}) ^ {\prime} - \frac {1}{1 + x ^ {2}} \\ = \frac {1}{x + \sqrt {1 + x ^ {2}}} \cdot \left(1 + \frac {x}{\sqrt {1 + x ^ {2}}}\right) - \frac {1}{1 + x ^ {2}} \\ = \frac {1}{x + \sqrt {1 + x ^ {2}}} \cdot \frac {x + \sqrt {1 + x ^ {2}}}{\sqrt {1 + x ^ {2}}} - \frac {1}{1 + x ^ {2}} = \frac {\sqrt {1 + x ^ {2}} - 1}{1 + x ^ {2}}, \\ \end{array}
$$
当 $x > 0$ 时，$g'(x) > 0$，则 $g(x)$ 是 $[0, +\infty)$ 上的单调递增函数，
故当 $x > 0$ 时，$g(x) > g(0) = 0$，即 $\arctan x < \ln (x + \sqrt{1 + x^2})$.

【精析】（1）由题意可知 $\int_0^t [f(x) - \sqrt{1 + x^4} ]\mathrm{d}x = t^3$
等式两边对 $t$ 求导得 $f(t) - \sqrt{1 + t^4} = 3t^2$
则 $f(t) = 3t^2 + \sqrt{1 + t^4}$，即 $f(x) = 3x^2 + \sqrt{1 + x^4}$
(2) 由 $f(x)g'(x) + f'(x)g(x) = 5x\sqrt{x}$ 知 $[f(x)g(x)]' = 5x\sqrt{x}$,
故 $f(x)g(x) = \int 5x\sqrt{x}\mathrm{d}x$
得 $f(x)g(x) = 2x^{\frac{5}{2}} + C$，则 $g(x) = \frac{2x^{\frac{5}{2}} + C}{3x^{2} + \sqrt{1 + x^{4}}} = \frac{2x^{2}\sqrt{x} + C}{3x^{2} + \sqrt{1 + x^{4}}}$
又 $g(0) = 1$，解得 $C = 1$，故 $g(x) = \frac{2x^2\sqrt{x} + 1}{3x^2 + \sqrt{1 + x^4}}.$
